name: Azure Application Gateway Orchestrator
description: The Azure Application Gateway Universal Orchestrator extension remotely manages certificates used by Azure Application Gateways, supporting both general certificate management and HTTPS/TLS Listener binding management.

store_types.Name: Azure Application Gateway Certificate
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or the IP address of the Azure Application Gateway. Example: myappgateway.example.com
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Azure Resource ID of the specific Azure Application Gateway instance where the certificate will be managed. Example: /subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/{gateway-name}

store_types.Name: Azure Application Gateway Certificate Binding
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or the IP address of the Azure Application Gateway. Example: myappgateway.example.com
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Azure Resource ID of the specific Azure Application Gateway instance and the specific HTTPS/TLS Listener to which the certificate will be bound. Example: /subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/{gateway-name}/frontendHttpListeners/{listener-name}
